[young Ani] I didn't want to, Mom.
-I was drunk. They're lying. -Oh my God, TifAni.
translation.ko: - 취했었어, 쟤들 말 거짓말이야 - 세상에나, 티파니

translation.en: This is why I say no drinking!
Well, I'm gonna call a lawyer as soon as I get home.
translation.ko: 집에 가면 바로 변호사한테 전화할 거야

translation.en: Oh, what are people gonna say?
You're never charged as an accomplice. But… What about your claims against the boys?
translation.ko: 공범으로 기소된 적은 없으시죠 남자애들과 관련한 주장은요?

translation.en: Why didn't you file charges back then?
I just thought they weren't worth pursuing.
translation.ko: 고발을 하는 게 별 의미가 없다고 생각했어요

translation.en: Mom.
-Mom-- -[Dinah] No, TifAni.
No, no.
-You disgust me. -[sobs]
I'm sorry.
You are not the daughter that I raised.
You're lucky you have a mother who got you a lawyer and supported you.
translation.ko: 변호사도 선임하고 지지해 준 엄마가 있어서 정말 다행이었네요

translation.en: Not everyone has that.
Hmm. Yes.
Very lucky.
Luckiest girl alive right here.
translation.ko: 가장 운이 좋은 여자라고 할 수도 있겠네요

translation.en: Do you wish your mother did more to help you?
translation.ko: 엄마가 좀 더 도와줬으면 하는 부분이 있나요?

translation.en: [Ani] I wish she hadn't looked at me like I was rode hard and put away wet.
translation.ko: 다 떨어진 젖은 걸레짝처럼 쳐다보지 않았더라면 좋았겠죠

translation.en: Ani, do you wanna say more about that, or should I move on?
translation.ko: 더 하시고 싶은 말씀 있으세요? 아니면 넘어갈까요?

translation.en: -Aaron, what the fuck? -Hi, Finny.
translation.ko: - 에런, 뭐 하는 거예요? - 안녕, 피니

translation.en: I swear, he's not supposed to be here until tomorrow.
-You need to get outta here. -[Dean] Wait.
Finny, please. Just give me five minutes.
[Aaron] What are you doing here? This is not what we talked about.
translation.ko: 뭐 하시는 거예요? 이런 얘기 없었잖아요

translation.en: Ani, stay. Ani, don't go. He should be the one to go. I'm getting him outta here.
translation.ko: 아니, 가지 마세요 지금 바로 내보낼게요

translation.en: -[Dean] Finny. -No, no. Don't worry about it.
-[Aaron] Ani. -Please.
[Aaron] Ani, wait.
Ani, wait. Ani. Don't let Dean run you out of here.
translation.ko: 아니, 잠깐만요 딘 때문에 도망가지 말아요

translation.en: Think about all the women you're gonna help by telling your story.
translation.ko: 당신 얘기를 통해 도움받을 여성들을 생각해요

translation.en: You're standing up for them too.
translation.ko: 그들을 위해 용기 내는 것이기도 해요

translation.en: All the women will be fine.
[Ani] My mother insisted I stick it out at Brentley.
It was a lonely two years.
My classmates and I had survived this life-changing event
translation.ko: 평생을 바꿔 놓은 사건에서 다른 아이들과 함께 생존했고

translation.en: that few people could understand.
translation.ko: 아주 소수의 사람만 이를 이해할 수 있었다

translation.en: They could lean on each other.
But I had no one.
My senior year, we took a field trip to New York City,
translation.ko: 그러다 졸업하던 해에 뉴욕으로 견학을 갔는데

translation.en: where I had this… experience.
[woman] I don't need to impress him.
So do you know when the samples are actually arriving?
-You okay? -Sorry.
No, the samples have to be there by Friday.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 금요일까지 샘플이 도착해야 한다고

translation.en: Yes, Friday. Did you not schedule it?
[Ani exhales] I'd never seen a woman like that before.
A woman who threatened people on the phone,
translation.ko: 전화에 대고 다른 사람들을 협박하는 여자

translation.en: who could buy herself expensive things,
translation.ko: 비싼 물건도 마음껏 살 수 있는 여자

translation.en: who cut a path through New York City simply because she looked like
translation.ko: 뉴욕 도심을 가로질러 당당하게 걸어가는 여자

translation.en: she had more important places to be than anyone else.
translation.ko: 누구보다 중요한 곳으로 향하는 듯 보이는 여자

translation.en: I just had to get to that, I decided…
translation.ko: 그때 난 꼭 저렇게 되리라고 결심했다

translation.en: And no one could ever hurt me again.
translation.ko: 그리고 그 누구도 다시는 나에게 상처 입히지 못할 거라고

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, come on.
-[Luke] Who wants another one? -[man 1] Yeah, grab me one.
translation.ko: - 더 마실 사람? - 나도 하나 줘

translation.en: [Luke] One, two, three, four more?
translation.ko: 하나, 둘, 셋, 네 병 더?

translation.en: -[man 2] Yes, sir. Thank you. -[man 3] Here we go, boys.
[man 1] There it is. I told you.
-You're home. -[men] Yeah!
-[Ani] Yeah. -[men laughing]
I left.
I'm done.
It just, um…
It just didn't feel right.
You know, I'm thinking about actually writing something myself.
translation.ko: 나에 대해 글로 써 볼까 생각 중이야

translation.en: Get it out of my system that way.
translation.ko: 그렇게 풀어내는 게 나을 거 같아

translation.en: I think that's really smart.
You want a drink?
Martini, straight up, three olives, no vermouth.
translation.ko: 마티니, 스트레이트 업 올리브 3개, 베르무트 빼고

translation.en: -Vodka, olives coming right up. -Okay.
Thank you for your service.
Please don't be mad, but I think I'm moving to London.
translation.ko: 화내지 말아 주세요 런던으로 이사 가게 될 거 같아요

translation.en: [exhales sharply] You think?
Well, guess what? I am mad, so deal with it.
translation.ko: 화를 안 낼 수는 없으니 자기가 알아서 해결해

translation.en: What's that?
I've written something.
You think The Times would want it?
You know what I wish I knew 38 years ago?
translation.ko: 38년 전에 깨달았으면 하고 바라는 게 뭔지 알아?

translation.en: It's a lot easier to be angry with the guy.
translation.ko: 남자한테 화를 내는 게 차라리 쉽다는 거야

translation.en: My high school boyfriend…
could be creative.
I'm sorry, LoLo.
[sighs] It's all right. There's no need to make a scene.
Your guys, I mean, they rot in the ground or whatever,
translation.ko: 당신을 가해한 놈들은 다 땅속에 묻혀 썩었겠지만

translation.en: but the people who love you,
who failed you so miserably,
translation.ko: 너무나 처참하게 당신을 보호하는 데 실패했지

translation.en: stop trying to protect them with this vague half-assery,
translation.ko: 그러니까 이런 모호한 글로 그들을 보호하려 하지 마

translation.en: and you might actually have something there.
But for now, let me be perfectly clear,
translation.ko: 지금은 이 말부터 들어 정확하게 말하는데

translation.en: an approximation of honesty
doesn't make the cut at the paper of record.
So, you know, take another swing at it.
Write it like no one will ever read it.
translation.ko: 평생 누구도 읽지 않을 것처럼 써

translation.en: Not Luke, not your musty in-laws, definitely not your parents.
translation.ko: 루크는 물론 고리타분한 시부모 당신 부모님까지 말이야

translation.en: That is how you write something worth reading.
translation.ko: 그제야 읽을 가치가 있는 글이 탄생할 거야

translation.en: I mean, no one's making you write about it.
translation.ko: 누가 등 떠밀어서 쓰는 글도 아니잖아

translation.en: I mean, go to London. Go live your life with Luke.
Just decide something.
Decide.
I'm… I'm trying.
Look, I'll make it very simple for you.
You just say what it is that you want,
not what everyone else wants,
and then you do that.
-If you tell anyone what I just told you-- -I won't.
translation.ko: - 내 얘기 퍼뜨리면… - 절대 안 해요

translation.en: No, about it being 38 years since I was a teenager,
I will hunt you down and make you eat a carb.
I had a choice to make on that day.
I could blame the world for what happened to me,
translation.ko: '나에게 일어난 일에 대해 세상을 원망할 수도 있었고'

translation.en: or I could find the opportunity.
Every challenge, every heartache,
every tragedy in life
offers an opportunity to do something different,
translation.ko: '다른 일을 할 수 있는 기회를 우리에게 안겨 줍니다'

translation.en: to do something kind.
[whispers] I told you. So inspiring, right?
translation.ko: 내 말이 맞지? 정말 감동적이지 않아?

translation.en: I haven't heard a word he's said. [laughs]
translation.ko: 너무 훈훈해서 말이 귀에 안 들어와

translation.en: -…no one can ever take away that choice. -[woman] Shh.
translation.ko: '누구도 그 선택을 뺏어 갈 수 없으니까요'

translation.en: [softly] Look, I could admit that I lied about your involvement in the shooting.
translation.ko: 총격에 네가 연루되었다는 말 거짓말이었다고 인정할게

translation.en: I was young a-and scared, confused.
translation.ko: 워낙 어렸고, 무서웠고 혼란스러웠을 수 있잖아

translation.en: People will understand that.
But… I don't know how the hell I'm gonna explain what happened with us.
translation.ko: 하지만 우리 사이에 있었던 일은 어떻게 설명해야 할지 모르겠어

translation.en: I have a wife.
[Ani] Three, two--
Daughters.
Mmm. Right at the buzzer.
And this would destroy them.
translation.ko: 이 얘기를 들으면 다들 삶이 피폐해질 거야

translation.en: But me, I was fair game?
I was just trying to get out ahead of you.
translation.ko: 난 그저 선수를 쳐야겠다고 생각했을 뿐이야

translation.en: I was scared that you'd tell the cops about that night at my house.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 우리 집에서 있었던 일을 경찰한테 말할까 봐 두려웠어

translation.en: Plus, I was stuck in this, and you weren't.
translation.ko: 게다가 난 휠체어까지 타게 됐는데 넌 아니었잖아

translation.en: So I was so angry at you.
Do you know the difference between me and someone like you, Dean?
translation.ko: 딘, 너 같은 애들이랑 내가 뭐가 다른지 알아?

translation.en: Between me and an Arthur?
Because I was angry too, so fucking angry you wouldn't believe it.
translation.ko: 나도 화가 났었어 정말 말도 안 되게 화가 났었어

translation.en: But my anger is like carbon monoxide.
It's odorless, tasteless, colorless, and completely toxic
translation.ko: 냄새도, 맛도, 색도 없지만 아주 유독했지

translation.en: but only to me.
See, I don't take my anger out on anyone other than my fucking self.
translation.ko: 나는 내 분노를 나 말고 다른 사람에게 내비친 적이 없어

translation.en: [whispers] I didn't mean for it to happen like that.
I was… drunk, you know?
I didn't even understand that that is what I was doing.
translation.ko: 내가 너한테 그런 짓을 하고 있다는 것도 몰랐어

translation.en: Not when I was crying?
Not when I was begging you to wait. Wait.
Wait, like we were gonna… we were gonna talk about it, figure it out.
translation.ko: 마치 멈추면 대화를 통해 해결할 수 있을 것처럼

translation.en: Do you know that every time I start to feel
translation.ko: 자존감이 좀 올라가려고 하면 그럴 때마다

translation.en: just a little bit good about myself, I remember that I begged…
translation.ko: 자존감이 좀 올라가려고 하면 그럴 때마다 애원하던 내 모습이 생각나

translation.en: and there that goes.
If you talk about that night, I'll deny it…
translation.ko: 그날 밤에 대해 얘기하면 난 부정할 거야

translation.en: and I'll double down on my claim that you planned it with Arthur and Ben.
translation.ko: 아서, 벤의 공범이라는 것도 더 강력하게 주장할 거야

translation.en: And there's a lot of people that are gonna believe me.
translation.ko: 엄청난 수의 사람들이 내 말을 믿을 거고

translation.en: Are you seriously trying to threaten me right now?
I'm trying to offer you a deal.
Okay?
You don't talk about what happened that night.
And I'll say you had nothing to do with the shooting.
There it is.
Look, I know I was an asshole back then,
translation.ko: 내가 그때 나쁜 놈이었던 건 알겠어

translation.en: but I have made it my mission to make up for that every day.
translation.ko: 하지만 매일 그때의 행동을 만회하기 위해 살고 있다고

translation.en: Does that… Does that not count for anything?
[Dean] Thank you.
See, I was a victim too…
but no one ever treated me like one.
translation.ko: 근데 아무도 날 피해자로 대하지 않았어

translation.en: So let's just stop with your self-pitying bullshit.
Do you know how many times I've said the word "rape" in my life?
translation.ko: 내가 살면서 '강간'이란 말을 얼마나 많이 했는지 알아?

translation.en: I know, I fucking hate that word too. Makes me wanna peel my skin off.
translation.ko: 나도 그 단어 싫어해 살갗을 다 깎아내고 싶을 만큼

translation.en: I wonder if you've ever used it,
translation.ko: 넌 강간이라는 말 해 본 적 있어?

translation.en: even once.
Probably not.
Probably not.
So I'm gonna sit here and watch you squirm
translation.ko: 그래서 난 여기 앉아서 네가 당황하는 걸 지켜볼 거야

translation.en: while you make it a part of your vocabulary.
[whispers] Fine.
Fine.
You win.
I, uh…
I raped you.
Okay?
[fan] It's really just an honor to meet you.
Um, thank you so much. You're such an inspiration.
translation.ko: 너무 감사해요 정말 많이 배우고 있어요

translation.en: [Ani] So I'm gonna sit here and watch you squirm
translation.ko: 그래서 난 여기 앉아서 네가 당황하는 걸 지켜볼 거야

translation.en: while you make it a part of your vocabulary.
[Dean] Fine. You win.
I, uh…
I raped you.
Need a lift?
[Ani] Good riddance, TifAni FaNelli,
welcome, Ani Harrison.
[Ani] You belong here.
You do.
I'm sorry. One second.
Yeah. Of course.
Okay.
Yeah. Thank you.
[gasps] Oh my God!
-Um, I'll… I'll catch up with you. -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
Hey.
Can we go talk?
This is running in The New York Times?
Yeah.
How could you not tell me about this?
I'm sorry.
I guess I… I just don't understand. I…
I always thought you had moved on from all this.
translation.ko: 이 일을 다 잊은 줄 알았거든

translation.en: I admired you for that. I thought you were so tough.
translation.ko: 그래서 더 멋지다고 생각했어 강한 여성이라고

translation.en: So tough that I try to skip the part where I hurt about this?
translation.ko: 내가 상처받은 일을 덮어두는 게 강한 거야?

translation.en: No. Until I do that, I'm just a fraud.
translation.ko: 아니야, 이걸 풀어내지 않으면 진짜로 살 수 없어

translation.en: Fine, but can't you work that out privately?
translation.ko: 그건 알겠는데 조용히 해결하면 안 되는 거야?

translation.en: Do you have to get into the nitty-gritty details for the whole world?
Those guys… were going around making fun of the shape of my pubic hair.
translation.ko: 걔네가 다 같이 내 음모 모양을 놀린 거 알아?

translation.en: They were making fun of the sounds I was making.
translation.ko: 내가 이상한 소리를 낸다고 비웃은 것도 알아?

translation.en: -So yes, the nitty-gritty matters to me. -They're dead.
translation.ko: - 그러니까 세세한 게 중요해 - 다 죽었잖아

translation.en: And one of them is in a wheelchair. Haven't they paid for their mistakes?
translation.ko: 한 놈은 휠체어를 타야 하고 실수에 대한 대가는 치른 듯한데?

translation.en: -Their mistakes? -They fucked up. I'm agreeing with you.
No, no, no. A-- A fuck-up is when you take your parent's car without permission
translation.ko: 아니지, 그런 말은 허락 없이 부모님 차를 몰았다가

translation.en: and… and scratch the paint.
A fuck-up doesn't even begin to encompass what they did to me.
translation.ko: 걔네가 나한테 한 짓은 그런 것과는 비교가 안 된다고

translation.en: Ani, it's our fucking rehearsal dinner.
How are we talking about this right now?
translation.ko: 어떻게 이 얘기를 지금 할 수가 있어?

translation.en: God! You used to be so different. You used to be so fun.
translation.ko: 미치겠네, 왜 이렇게 변한 거야? 예전엔 유쾌한 사람이었잖아

translation.en: -Fun? -Yes, fun.
We used to have fun together. I miss that.
translation.ko: 예전엔 같이 있으면 즐거웠잖아 그때가 너무 그리워

translation.en: I don't know if I'm fun.
I don't know what's me
and what part I invented to make people like me.
translation.ko: 뭐가 사람들의 환심을 얻으려 만들어진 모습인지 모른다고

translation.en: God, I used to be so proud of that. I-I…
I thought it was this chameleon who was so much smarter than everyone.
translation.ko: 마치 카멜레온 같아서 내가 가장 똑똑한 거 같았거든

translation.en: [sobs] So much smarter that I don't even know a thing about myself.
translation.ko: 얼마나 똑똑한지 나 자신에 대해 아는 게 없네

translation.en: Hey, hey. I don't believe that.
translation.ko: 아니야, 난 그렇게 생각 안 해

translation.en: -We can get back there. Hey, stop. -[Ani sobs]
We can get back there.
I love you. You love me. We can figure it out.
translation.ko: 사랑해, 자기도 날 사랑하고 다 해결할 수 있어

translation.en: [Ani] No.
Do you remember the time you said you felt like a box
translation.ko: 자기가 내 성공을 증명하는 미션 중 하나인 것 같다고

translation.en: that I just checked off?
I do love you…
But I've been using you. [whimpers]
I resent you.
It's not… It's not fair.
You're not the one who hurt me, but I… but I take it out on you.
translation.ko: 당신이 날 아프게 한 것도 아닌데 당신에게 화풀이를 하니까

translation.en: -I've never felt like you resent me. -Because I'm like a wind-up doll.
translation.ko: - 원망한다고 느낀 적 없어 - 그야 내가 태엽 인형 같으니까

translation.en: Turn my key, and I'll tell you exactly what you wanna hear.
translation.ko: 태엽을 감으면 원하는 말을 해주는 인형 말이야

translation.en: I have denied myself and denied myself. [sniffles]
I'm fine.
I'm not hurt.
And it has… it has built up this rage inside of me.
Look, I… I should've faced up to all of this sooner.
I… I just think that I need to do it now
without worrying about what you or anyone else thinks about it.
translation.ko: 자기나 다른 사람들의 시선에서 벗어난 상태에서

translation.en: Is this really happening right now?
[Ani] It's like LoLo said,
an approximation of honesty won't make the cut.
translation.ko: 진실의 언저리에 있는 글은 충분하지 않다

translation.en: And that's what I had with Luke.
I hate that I hurt him,
but this is where I belong.
This is what I always wanted.
I'd be lying if I said I wasn't suffering
from a mild case of phantom limb syndrome.
But maybe things are brighter without it.
translation.ko: 하지만 반지가 없어서 더 밝은 미래가 펼쳐질지도

translation.en: "If you read one thing today,
it should be Ani FaNelli's essay in New York Times Magazine."
translation.ko: '뉴욕 타임스에 실린 아니 파넬리의 에세이를 읽으시길'

translation.en: "I sent it to every woman I know, and so should you!"
translation.ko: '여성인 지인 모두와 공유했고 당신도 그러기를 바란다'

translation.en: -[laughter] -[Nell] Oh, Dean Barton is so fucked!
Oh my God!
-Ooh! Get up! -I'm up!
You're going viral!
-Oh my God. -Ugh! Wait, do you… do you have any OJ?
[Ani] Yeah, I keep the Sunny D in the side door.
translation.ko: 응, 냉장고 문에 보면 써니 D 있을 거야

translation.en: She's a funny writer girl.
Look it!
-[squeals] -Look at this!
Ah! I'm so proud of you.
[commenter 1] I just finished reading your piece and am utterly haunted.
translation.ko: 글 잘 읽었습니다 뇌리에서 떠나지를 않네요

translation.en: Thank you for speaking up.
From someone who has always felt like no one would listen to her anyway.
translation.ko: 누구도 내 얘길 듣지 않을 거라고 생각했던 한 독자가

translation.en: [commenter 2] I cried reading your essay.
Thank you for putting it out into the world.
[commenter 3] I was also assaulted by a guy I thought was a friend.
translation.ko: 저도 친구라고 생각했던 사람에게 성폭력을 당했습니다

translation.en: Hearing your story gives me hope that one day I can tell mine too.
translation.ko: 당신의 이야기를 들으니 저도 훗날 말할 수 있을 거 같아요

translation.en: [commenter 4] I was raped while completely unconscious.
The lines about coming to
hit me so hard.
[commenter 5] I never told anyone,
not even my husband.
[Ani] When I sat down to write this essay, the goal was to avenge my reputation,
translation.ko: 에세이를 처음 쓰기 시작했을 땐 내 평판에 대한 복수를 원했다

translation.en: maybe stick it to the people who hurt me.
translation.ko: 나를 아프게 한 사람들을 아프게 하고 싶었다

translation.en: But it's become so much more than that.
translation.ko: 하지만 그보다 훨씬 커다란 일이 되었다

translation.en: -Ani. So nice to meet you. -So much more than me.
translation.ko: 아니 나보다 훨씬 커다란 일이 되었다 만나서 반가워요

translation.en: Of course. Thank you.
[Rachel] Now, I read your op-ed…
[Ani] It's about the importance of all of us speaking freely,
translation.ko: 결국은 자유로운 의사 표현의 중요성에 관한 문제가 됐다

translation.en: even if people wanna silence us.
translation.ko: 사람들이 우리를 침묵하게 하려고 해도 말이다

translation.en: So that we can become the kind of women our younger selves would admire.
translation.ko: 어린 세대가 우러러볼 수 있는 그런 여성이 되기 위해

translation.en: I'm hearing from women who have never shared their stories,
translation.ko: 많은 여성분들이 처음으로 자신의 이야기를 털어놓고 있어요

translation.en: from women who have carried this horrible thing
with them alone for 38 years,
and I just hope that no one has to ever do that again.
translation.ko: 저는 그저 다시는 그런 일이 없기를 바랄 뿐이에요

translation.en: I hope that people feel compelled to share their stories,
translation.ko: 모두가 자신의 이야기를 공유하게 되면 좋겠어요

translation.en: to talk about what happened to them,
and to know that you have nothing to be ashamed of.
translation.ko: 절대 부끄러워할 일이 아니란 걸 알았으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: [Rachel] Wow.
Ani, thank you so much for being here.
-Of course. -[Rachel] Truly inspiring story.
Thank you.
TifAni FaNelli, right?
Yeah.
Sarah Gardener. I cover public health for Bloomberg.
translation.ko: 세라 가드너예요 블룸버그 공중 보건 기자예요

translation.en: [Ani] Okay.
Gun control is under my domain.
I've covered Dean Barton's career quite extensively.
translation.ko: 딘 바턴의 활동도 굉장히 많이 다뤘어요

translation.en: He's helped a lot of people over the years.
translation.ko: 딘 바턴은 수년간 굉장히 많은 사람들을 도왔어요

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Let's hope your 15 minutes of fame will too.
translation.ko: 당신의 반짝 유명세도 많은 사람을 도우면 좋겠네요

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you.
Excuse me. I'm so sorry. I…
I would love to stay in touch, but I already forgot your name.
translation.ko: 계속 연락하고 싶은데 벌써 이름을 까먹었네요

translation.en: -It's Sarah Gard-- -That's okay.
I'll just remember you as the woman I told to go fuck herself on 5th Avenue.
translation.ko: 5번가에서 내가 꺼지라고 한 여자 이렇게 기억하면 되겠네요

translation.en: [Ani] Gotta work on that delivery, FaNelli, but fuck that felt good.
translation.ko: 멋있게 말하는 연습 좀 해야겠다 근데 기분 째지는데?

translation.en: ♪ Yes, I'm free ♪
♪ Yeah, I'm free ♪
♪ Oh, I’m free ♪
translation.ko: "본인 혹은 지인이 성폭력을 경험했거나" "정신적인 어려움을 겪고 있다면"

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, I'm free ♪
